tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BiometricTemplates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    template_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password_hash VARCHAR(100),
    biometric_template_id INT REFERENCES BiometricTemplates(id)
)

CREATE TABLE AuthenticationLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    auth_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
